app.title: LegalEase AI - Legal Document Analysis
app.description: AI-powered legal document analysis with risk assessment and plain-language summaries

chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! Upload a legal document and ask me anything. I'll summarize, flag risky clauses, and answer questions in simple language.
chat.welcomeDescription: Upload a legal document and ask me anything. I'll provide summaries, flag risky clauses, and answer your questions in plain language.
chat.placeholder: Ask about clauses, risks, or request a plain-English summaryâ€¦
chat.documentProcessed: Document processed successfully! Found {count} clauses. You can now ask questions about the document.
chat.documentProcessingFailed: Document processing failed. Please try uploading again or contact support if the issue persists.
chat.noDocumentsSelected: No documents selected. Upload or choose from sidebar.
chat.typingHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.newChatStarted: New chat session started. Upload a document or pick from Recent Docs, then ask your questions.
chat.extractingClauses: Extracting clauses, analyzing risks, and calculating readability scores...

analysis.title: Document Analysis
analysis.uploadForAnalysis: Upload a document to see risk analysis
analysis.documentComplexity: Document complexity is above high school level

readability.title: Readability Analysis
readability.uploadForReadability: Upload a document to see readability analysis
readability.failedToLoad: Failed to load readability analysis. Please refresh to try again.

insights.aboveHighSchool: Document complexity is above high school level
insights.veryDifficultText: Text is very difficult to read - consider seeking expert advice
insights.challengingForGeneral: Document is challenging for general readers
insights.mostAccessible: Most clauses are reasonably accessible to read

gradeLevel.title: Grade Level Score
gradeLevel.explanation: Indicates the education level needed to understand the text. Based on average sentence length and word complexity.
gradeLevel.elementary: Elementary/Middle School - Most people can understand
gradeLevel.highSchool: High School/Business Level - Requires focused attention
gradeLevel.college: College Level - Requires careful reading and analysis

fleschScale.title: Flesch Reading Ease
fleschScale.explanation: Measures text difficulty from 0-100. Higher scores indicate easier reading.
fleschScale.veryDifficult: Very Difficult - may need expert help

legalContext.title: Legal Document Context
legalContext.explanation: Legal documents are typically more complex than general text. Here's what different readability levels mean:
legalContext.averagePersonExplanation: May struggle with grades above 12, should seek clarification for important clauses
legalContext.businessProfessionalExplanation: Can handle most contract language but may need help with specialized terms
legalContext.legalProfessionalExplanation: Comfortable with complex legal terminology and concepts

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.graduateLevel: Consider seeking legal review due to high complexity (Grade 16+)
recommendations.collegeLevel: Document requires careful reading and attention to detail
recommendations.accessible: Document is relatively accessible for most readers
recommendations.complexClauses: Pay special attention to {count} highly complex clauses
recommendations.veryDifficult: Consider professional legal assistance for understanding
recommendations.mixedComplexity: Document has mixed complexity - focus extra attention on difficult sections

explanations.fleschKincaid: The Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level indicates the U.S. school grade level needed to understand the text. For example, a score of 10.4 means a 10th-grade reading level.
explanations.fleschScore: The Flesch Reading Ease score rates text on a 100-point scale. Higher scores indicate easier reading, with 90-100 being very easy and 0-30 being very difficult.
explanations.gradeLevel: Grade Level measures the formal education level required to comprehend the text. Scores above 13 indicate college-level complexity.
explanations.difficulty: Reading difficulty is determined by sentence length and syllable complexity. Complex legal language often results in higher difficulty scores.

validation.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload
validation.fileSizeLimit: File size must be less than 10MB
validation.processingError: Document processing failed on the server

negotiation.title: Negotiation Alternatives
negotiation.generatingMessage: AI is analyzing your clause and generating strategic alternatives...
negotiation.errorMessage: Failed to generate alternatives. Please try again.
negotiation.selectDocument: Select a document to generate negotiation alternatives

alternativeDescriptions.balanced: A middle-ground alternative that addresses the main risks while remaining reasonable
alternativeDescriptions.protective: A more protective alternative that significantly reduces risk
alternativeDescriptions.simplified: A clearer, simpler version that removes ambiguity
